channel.title: CVE Feed for qemu -- display
channel.description: The latest CVEs for qemu -- display

item.title: CVE-2017-2615|2024-08-05T14:02:06.484Z -- qemu -- display
item.description: Quick emulator (QEMU) built with the Cirrus CLGD 54xx VGA emulator support is vulnerable to an out-of-bounds access issue. It could occur while copying VGA data via bitblt copy in backward mode. A privileged user inside a guest could use this flaw to crash the QEMU process resulting in DoS or potentially execute arbitrary code on the host with privileges of QEMU process on the host.
